Metadata.title: Hailey Kim | FE Developer
Metadata.description: Hi! I'm Hailey Kim, a front-end developer.

Home.subtitle: FE Developer
Home.title: Hailey Kim
Home.description: Turn creative ideas into engaging websites.

About.title: About
About.content: Hey there! I'm a front-end developer based in Seoul, passionate about creating websites that are easy on the eyes and easy to use. I focus on making websites user-friendly, fast, and efficient. Always up for learning new tech and collaborating with others to bring innovative web visions to life.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.overview1: 작업기간: 2024.04.03 - 04.27 (총 25일) 작업인원: 1명 (개인 프로젝트) 소개: 책을 좋아하는 사람들을 위한 소셜 플랫폼. 주요기능:
Projects.overview3: 작업기간: 2024.04.29 - 05.10 (총 11일), 꾸준히 유지보수 & 업데이트 중 작업인원: 1명 (개인 프로젝트) 소개: 지금 보고 계시는, 제 포트폴리오를 담은 웹사이트. 주요 기능: 다국어 지원 (한국어, 영어), 커스텀 커서, 풍부한 애니메이션 효과, 커스텀 도메인으로 배포
Projects.features1:
A social media platform for book lovers.
- responsive design, dark mode
- sign up & sign in by email or Google account
- My Account: edit profile, view & delete my posts∙reviews∙likes∙bookmarks
- Posts: write, search, comment, like or bookmark
- view current Bestsellers and New Arrivals
- Books: search, rate and review
- Bookstore: search and view the location on the map
Projects.features2:
- responsive design, dark mode
- view & search products
- view products by category and sort by price
- add products to cart, change quantities, and checkout
- safe sign up & sign in with token-based authentication
Projects.features3:
The website you are viewing right now.
- responsive design, dark mode
- internationalization (English, Korean)
- published on a custom domain
- smooth animations and custom cursor
